thread.title: Dragon Ball Fusions We Want To See
thread.title_full: Dragon Ball Fusions We Want To See

author: Riley Hutchins
title: Dragon Ball Fusions We Want To See
text:
Dragon Ball Fusions We Want To See Riley Hutchins Start Slideshow Slide of 
Dragon Ball is known for its fast-paced fighting sequences, funny yet emotional moments, and a multitude of loveable characters. Fans of Dragon Ball also get to look forward to seeing new fusions of their favorite characters, something whih keeps them guessing saga after saga. 
For those unfamiliar, a fusion is the process of two separate being turned into one as their special attributes, their strength and speed, and their wisdom are combined. Some fusions have created a single being that has power beyond what could of been imagined from the fusees alone. 
There are many types of fusions that are have been currently shown in the Dragon Ball lore, such as: Namekian, Fusion Dance, Potara Earrings, EX-Fusion, Merge, and Possession. Some fusions are one user basically controlling the other's body, such as Namekin and possession, while others are true fusions of two characters. Both are present, and their abilities are seen and sometimes like in Fusion Dance, and Potara Earrings. 
There have been dozens of fusions so far in the Dragon Ball story , but there are also dozens of fusions that fans want to seeâ€¦so here are 5 Dragon Ball fusions we want to see.
